bibl.title: Miguel John VERSLUYS and Paul G.P. MEYBOOM (Edd.), Nile into Tiber. Egypt in the Roman World. Proceedings of the IIIrd International Conference of Isis Studies, Faculty of Archaeology, Leiden University, May 11-14 2005.
bibl.note: I. Interpretations of the meaning of Aegyptiaca Romana. - II. Understanding the cults of Isis in their local context. - 21 communications. - Pp. 555-562: Indices.
bibl.seg: BRICAULT Laurent, Miguel John VERSLUYS and Paul G.P. MEYBOOM (Edd.), Nile into Tiber. Egypt in the Roman World. Proceedings of the IIIrd International Conference of Isis Studies, Faculty of Archaeology, Leiden University, May 11-14 2005. (Religions in the Graeco-Roman World. 159.)
